Картинка

Elements.Images.UIImage

string:           [urlFull]             - ссылка на полную версию, если есть
string:           url                   - ссылка на картинку
string:           [title]               - title 
string:           [alt]                 - alt 
string:           [cors='anonymous']    - CORS attribute
number:           [size = 64]           - size one of 32, 63, 128, 256, 512
string:           [height]              - height as CSS size value
string:           [width]               - width as CSS size value
boolean:          [contained=false]     - contained inside
boolean:          [covered=false]       - covering outside
boolean:          [pointable]           - pointer cursor
string:           [class = '']          - additional classes to FIGURE containing IMG
function:         [onclick]             - event callback
function:         [onkeyup]             - event callback
